title: Person in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right

verbs: Can depict moving or navigating with a motorized wheelchair.
nouns: A person using a powered wheelchair facing to the right.

description: A person seated in a motorized wheelchair facing right, symbolizing accessibility, independence, and inclusivity for people with disabilities.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji shows a person using a motorized wheelchair, facing to the right. The design features realistic chair details with metallic highlights and soft gradients, conveying a modern assistive mobility device. It represents accessibility, empowerment, and the independence of wheelchair users.
